body_html: I have tried VS 2017 multiple time but failed to build so i did it with visual studio 2015. Hope we can build it using Visual Studio 2017 later soon. I have created a tutorial for building tensorflow on windows 10 using cmake and visual studio 2015 update 3 on my blog here http://www.python36.com/install-tensorflow-gpu-windows . Thanks @gunan for helping with great deep learning library.

I have created a tutorial for building tensorflow on windows 10 using cmake and visual studio 2015 update 3 on my blog here http://www.python36.com/install-tensorflow-gpu-windows .
